backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling user registration for multiple roles, superadmin claiming, user ID generation, and access-control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files and backend/main.mo for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining light and dark theme CSS variables and shared design tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Custom router using browser history to render pages for auth flows and dashboards with a 404 fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor using the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hooks managing AuthClient setup, login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/index.css: Duplicate Tailwind-based theme token definitions controlling colors and layout primitives.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry that wraps App with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientLogin.ts: Client login page with disabled login buttons and links to registration or return.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientRegister: Client registration form collecting basic user and company info with a submit button.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard showing a simple header and a static system stability message.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AsistenmuD: Asistenmu dashboard displaying a static appreciation message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ClientDash: Client dashboard presenting a static control-room themed message.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ConciergeD: Concierge dashboard showing a gratitude message with disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/FinanceDas: Finance dashboard featuring a static message about maintaining financial flow.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PartnerDas: Partner dashboard with a static message about growth and responsibility.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/Superadmin: Superadmin dashboard showing a static message about full system control.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLand: Internal landing page offering links to internal login and registration.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Internal login page with selectable roles and disabled login actions.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Static internal registration form with fields for name, email, WhatsApp, and role selection. Contains no backend logic and only renders UI components.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page offering client, partner, and internal access links with registration options.
Static partner login page showing two disabled login buttons and links to register or return home. Includes footer with dynamic year and external link.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerRegist: Static partner registration form collecting name, email, WhatsApp, skills, and domicile. Provides only UI layout with no functional submission logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values. Supports both query-string and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, and container settings. Enables typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing frontend constraints and detailed backend modification rules, including append-only requirements and role/user ID logic specifications.
